participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Laid-back and easygoing, but tends to be introverted and shy in social situations.
participant_1.background: I am male. My weaknesses are sweets. I am unsociable. I am a jack of all, master of none.

participant_2.name: Anastasia
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, with a strong passion for exploring new places and cultures.
participant_2.background: My favorite music is rock and roll. I love to travel. I am from Russia. I enjoy skiing. I go to school for business.

content.text: What's your favorite music?
I like rock and roll.
Cool, me too! What bands do you like?
I like the Beatles, the Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
I love the Beatles! I also like the Who and Pink Floyd.
Oh, I love Pink Floyd too! What's your favorite album?
My favorite album is Dark Side of the Moon.
That's a great album! My favorite is Wish You Were Here.
That's a good one too! What's your favorite song by Pink Floyd?
My favorite song is "Comfortably Numb".
That's a great song! What's your favorite band from Russia?
I like Kino.
I've never heard of them. What kind of music do they play?
They're a rock band. They're pretty good.
I'll have to check them out. Do you like to travel?
Yeah, I love to travel. I've been to a lot of different countries.
I've only been to a few countries. I'd love to travel more.
You should! It's a great way to learn about different cultures.
I know, I know. I'll get on it.
Good! You won't regret it.
